title: the annual taste of times square
description: Get ‘tastes’ from 30 restaurants for under $10 each. Save 20% when you purchase a wristband in advance.
address: Duffy Square and the Broadway Plazas between 43rd + 48th Streets

title: 28th annual ferragosto festival
description: Arthur Avenue between East 187th St + Crescent Ave (Bronx).
address: Arthur Avenue between East 187th St + Crescent Ave, Bronx

title: west side county fair
description: Pier I in Riverside Park South (UWS).
address: Pier I in Riverside Park South, UWS

title: nyc labor day parade
description: Fifth avenue from 44th to 64th street.

title: taiwanfest
description: 6th ave (bet, 39th + 40th st), manhattan.

title: korea fest
description: Culture Lab LIC (Queens).

title: 51st annual gracie square art show
description: Carl Schurz Park (Yorkville).

title: thx it’s thrifted day-to-night market
description: Brooklyn Roots Collective (East Williamsburg).

title: the first-ever curbside restaurant week
description: 39 participating restaurants with outdoor seating.

title: armory arts week
description: A weekend of major shows featuring artists and galleries from around the world.

title: neurotica fest
description: A four-day lineup of storytelling, solo comedy shows, book talks, and more at Under St. Marks Theater and Parkside Lounge (East Village/LES).

title: 12th brooklyn wildlife summer festival
description: The brooklyn wildlife summer fest returns for an 12th year with indie and diy musicians, artists, and creatives over three days.

title: first novel friday at the center for fiction
description: An evening celebrating a selection of notable debut novels with author readings, discussion, and signings.
address: The Center for Fiction, Fort Greene

title: lower east stories
description: A storytelling salon where each month brings a fresh theme and fresh tales.

title: nerd nite: 20th season premiere
description: Fun-yet-informative presentations on a wide range of subjects.
cost: $12 for the presentations at 8:15pm, add $4 to play pre-show trivia at 7pm

title: immigrant jam comedy
description: A stand-up show featuring immigrant and first generation comedians.

title: bryant park picnic performances
description: Free live music, theater, and dance in the heart of midtown.

title: free friday at magnet theater
description: Catch premiere: the improvised musical or the friday night show for exactly zero dollars.

title: bitches brew comedy show
description: A women-produced and-hosted comedy show.

title: what i did for love: improv based on your love story
description: UCB improvisers interview an audience member about their love life, then turn their stories into a fully improvised performance.

title: the drunk texts: the devil weareth prada or, a wintour’s tale
description: A shakespearean retelling of the devil wear’s prada that combines drinking games, improvisation, and audience participation.

title: three-day champion
description: A comedic storytelling podcast wrapped inside a game show.

title: judith fair: a drag tribute show
description: A tribute to the alt lesbian and lesbian-adjacent divas of the 1990’s.
